name: Flower Gunpowder
description:
Plant flowers in flowerbeds to craft different magic spells  and fight against underground rodents to achive mastery in the art of landscape design!

Features:

  • 13780 possible magic spells
  • Survive the invasion of underground rodents
  • Listen to heavy music 

Controls:

  • wasd: move
  • Left click: build flowerbeds and shoot spells
  • Righ click: plant flowers and use flowerbeds
  • Enter: start game
